title: paripUrNa candrAnanam
sahitya:
paripUrNa candrAnanAm sadA bhaja paramEsha kAminIm pArvatIm


anupallavi

  smarakOTi lAvaNya marakata mAlinIm madhu mada nayanIm matangakumArIm


caraNam    hAlasyapura rAjApUjita bhAminIm ati pankaja bhava vinuta suvAsinIm
tripura sadanIm shrta bhakta pAlinIm shrI mahAtripursundarIm shankarIm
